pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Integrated Framework for Textual Sentiment Time Series Aggregation and Prediction // Time series analysis based on textual sentiment, accounting for the intrinsic challenge that sentiment can be computed and pooled across texts and time in many ways. As described in Ardia et al. (2017) https://ssrn.com/abstract=3067734, the package provides a means to model the impact of sentiment in texts on a target variable, by first computing a wide range of textual sentiment measures and then selecting those that are most informative.
